name: Santa vs Frost
description:
Join the eternal battle between Santa Claus and Mr. Frost. Play with your friend and experience the thrill of delivering the children's presents as Santa Claus while being under heavy assault by the chilling Mr. Frost!

Will you be The One who confronts and overcomes the perils and gets the best score

Kuopio Christmas Game Jam 2018 entry. Theme was "Surprise".

The game is meant to be played with two controllers (Xbox or PS4 with DS4Windows works good), but there is also a debug keyboard layout.
Player 1: Keys 1, 2, 3, 4, Arrow keys, Space and Enter
Player 2: Numpad 1, 2, 3, 4, 0, Numpad Enter
